group_1.textRight: ...*Chuckle*

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-why are you laughing now of all times?!

group_1.textRight: Because Kirari is even more nervous than I am.

group_1.textLeft: Of course I am!
Shortly they'll announce the winner of the student@council presidency we've waited so long for, no?!
If anything it's weird of Yuna that you could remain@so calm.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?
There is nothing we can do but wait for the result...
So you only need to stand tall.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha...@That's so like Yuna.

group_1.textCenter: ...To close, we move on to the voting results for the@student council president of the high school division.

group_1.textLeft: (Here it comes...!)

group_1.textCenter: The new student council president is...
...1st year in the high school division, Yuna Kureha.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
[chara:102201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You won!@Yuna is the student council president!!

group_1.textCenter: Yuna Kureha, please come over to the rostrum.

group_1.textLeft: I'll keep my eyes on Yuna's imposing figure@from here.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank you, I will see you soon.

group_1.textCenter: I am Yuna Kureha, a 1st year student at the high@school division, and I have been elected as the@student council president on this occasion.
First off, I would like to give my thanks to everyone@who voted for me.
Really, thank you so much.
Excuse me...
I actually wanted to, make an impressive statement@here...
I never thought becoming a president would make@me so happy...
I intended to stay calm as the one who will lead the@people around me but...
Yuna...
...Then once again, I will tell you this.
Last time on this podium, I pledged to try my@best to...
...make this school the place where the students'@initiative is respected.
But, I do not think it is something so easy to achieve@alone.
To all the new student council members and@teachers...
And the students who support me...
And more importantly, the ones who have helped@me with my activities until today...
As well as my irreplaceable friends and...
...the ones who have brought enormous passion into@my activities... my comrades.
(Woah, Yuna...!)
(Don't look this way!)
(Yuna, you're the president now, so you should look after the whole school!)
To reform, it takes all of us.
So...please continue to give us your support.

group_1.narration: *Clap Clap Clap Clap!!*@*Clap Clap Clap Clap!!*@*Clap Clap Clap Clap!!*@*Clap Clap Clap Clap!!*

group_1.textLeft: ...You did very well, Yuna.

group_1.textRight: ...Kirari?

group_1.textLeft: Uh, yes?
This is the handkerchief of that time...

group_1.textRight: Wipe the tears.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, huh?@Sorry, I didn't notice that...
...Somehow, it seems that I'm relieved.

group_1.textRight: Because the election has ended without any@problem?

group_1.textLeft: That and...@How should I say this...
Hikaru no longer needs to, take it all on by@herself now...
Hikaru was alone when Hikaru borrowed this@handkerchief.

group_1.textRight: Well yeah...@Since it was an empty classroom.

group_1.textLeft: That, that's not what I meant!
I had no friends around me, so every day,@I was anxious...
Not figuratively but, really I was all alone...
...Y-Yuna!

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Could you give this handkerchief to Hikaru?

group_1.textRight: ...I can't decide.

group_1.textLeft: As I expected, it's difficult...

group_1.textRight: Because this handkerchief is my favorite...
Besides, if they find out that Kirari has my@handkerchief...
Something like, a strange rumor would be spread,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's...

group_1.textRight: So, I want you to promise me...
...that you will never lose that handkerchief.
And that, you will be on my side to be of help so@you can return it at any time.
These are, the conditions for giving you that@handkerchief.
Can you keep them?
...Hikaru?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Ah, yes!
(Wherever you are, whenever it is...)
(Hikaru will support Yuna!)

group_1.textCenter: The Eldest Sister is the only one I can get@passionate about.
